name: Rope Trap
introductionDescription: A rope is knotted below a ledge. As you begin to climb down, a trap is triggered from a mechanism on the other side as the rope begins to drop as well.
successDescription: You manage to fall with grace, landing on your feet while making almost no loud noises.
failDescription: You fall, inflicting some pain to your legs. A loud bang is heard from the other side of the room, hopefully no enemies were alerted.
